title: Barbarian
contents: property | Armor | Light and medium armor, shields
property | Weapons | Simple weapons, martial weapons
property | Skills | Choose 2: Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Perception, Survival
bullet | a) a greataxe or b) any martial melee weapon
bullet | a) two handaxes or b) any simple melee weapon
bullet | An explorers pack and 4 javelins

title: Rage
contents: text | You begin raging as a bonus action, while raging you gain the following benefits
bullet | You have adv on Str checks and Str saving thows
bullet | When using a Str melee weapon you gain a damage bonus
bullet | You have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing and slashing dmg
text | You cannot cast spells while raging. Raging last for 1 minute (must attack hostile or take dmg to continue rage)

title: Unarmored Defence
contents: text | While not wearing armor your AC = 10 + Dex + Con, you can use a shield and still gain this benefit.

title: Reckless Attack
contents: text | Starting at 2nd level when you make your first attack on your turn, you can decide to attack recklessly. Doing so gives you advantage on melee weapon attack rolls using Str during this turn, but attack rolls against you have advantage until your next turn.

title: Danger Sense
contents: text | At 2nd level you have advantage on Dex saving throws against affects you can see such as traps and spells. This does not work if you are blind, deafened, or incapacitated.

title: Extra Attack
contents: text | Beginning at 5th level, you can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

title: Fast Movement
contents: text | Beginning at 5th level, your speed increases by 10' when you aren't wearing any armor.

title: Feral Instinct
contents: text | Beginning at 7th level, you have advantage on initiative rolls.

text | Additionally, if you are surprised at the beginning of combat and arenâ€™t incapacitated, you can act normally on your first turn, but only if you enter your rage before doing anything else on that turn.

title: Brutal Critical
contents: text | Beginning at 9th level roll one additional die when you do critical Dmg
text | Starting at 13th level, roll two additional dice.
text | Starting at 20th level, roll 3 additional dice.

title: Relentless Rage
contents: text | Beginning at 11th level, if you drop to 0 hp and don't die outright while raging, make a DC 10 Con saving throw. If you succeed you drop to 1 HP instead.
text | Each time you use this feature after the first the DC increases by 5 until you take a short or long rest.

title: Persistant Rage
contents: text | Beginning at 15th level your rage only ends if you fall unconscious or choose to end it early.

title: Indomitable Might
contents: text | Beginning at 18th level if your total Str check is less than your Str score you can use the score in place of the total.

title: Primal Champion
contents: text | Beginning at 20th level your Str and Con increase by 4 to a max of 24.

title: Frenzey
contents: text | Beginning at 3rd level you can make a single melee attack as a bonus action each turn. When your rage ends you suffer one level of exhaustion

title: Mindless Rage
contents: text | Beginning at 6th level you cannot be charmed or frightened while raging.

title: Intimidating Presense
contents: text | Beginning at 10th level you can use your action to frighten someone within 30' of you. DC = 8 + Prof. + Cha. This last until the end of your next turn. This effect ends if the creature moves out of sight or is 60' away.
text | If the creature succeeds it saving throw you cannot use this feature again on that creature for 24 hours.

title: Retaliation
contents: text | Starting at 14th level if you take damage from a creature that is within 5' of you, you can use your reaction to make a melee attack against that creature.
